headline: Morgan Stanley Downgrades The Progressive Corporation (PGR) Stock to Equal Weight
summary: The Progressive Corporation (NYSE:PGR) is one of the Best Large Cap Value Stocks to Invest In. Morgan Stanley analyst Bob Huang downgraded the company’s stock to “Equal Weight” from “Overweight” with a price objective of $290, down from the prior target of $330, as reported by The Fly. The downgrade exhibits the firm’s view that The Progressive Corporation […]

headline: Bow River Capital Completes the Sale of Progressive Roofing to TopBuild Corp.
summary: Bow River Capital, a Denver-based alternative asset management firm, today announced that it has completed the sale of Progressive Roofing, a leading provider of commercial roofing services, to TopBuild Corp. (NYSE: BLD) in an all-cash transaction valued at $810 million.

raw.headline: Bow River Capital Completes the Sale of Progressive Roofing to TopBuild Corp.

headline: Harding Loevner Global Equity Q2 2025 Report
summary: The Global Equity composite rose 10.3% gross of fees in the second quarter, lagging the 11.7% gain in the MSCI ACWI Index.
